qas.question: What are some charitable efforts Kanye west has participated in?

answers.text: 100 Black Men of America, a Live Earth concert benefit, World Water Day rally

context: West has additionally appeared and participated in many fundraisers, benefit concerts, and has done community work for Hurricane Katrina relief, the Kanye West Foundation, the Millions More Movement, <a0_0>100 Black Men of America, a Live Earth concert benefit, World Water Day rally<a0_0/> and march, Nike runs, and a MTV special helping young Iraq War veterans who struggle through debt and PTSD a second chance after returning home.
